name: Mole Bass
description:
Create your own sound!

Find all rooms in the house and get some music stuff for your home cave

Controls
  • Movement - WASD, arrows or gamepad d-pad/stick
  • Action - SPACE, mouse click, or gamepad buttons
Tips
  • You can climb the downspout
  • All music stuff is different, there are 256 variations of mix
Tools
  • Engine: Unity 3D + FMOD
  • Music: Reaper, SQ8ROM VST + drum samples
  • Pixel Art: Aseprite
  • Sounds: GDC - Game Audio Bundles
Development

I’m newbie in Unity and it was difficult for me to add FMOD (didn’t used it before) and make an isometric game. So I planned to make it for a compo.. I spent all three days and turned it to jam.

Anyway it is done and I will be happy if you like this game 

Download for Windows: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1M7-aWYSMRB1OY31DQSdVGBraQsMPPu9j/view?usp=shari...
